name: Orbisius Resume Organizer
author: Svetoslav Marinov (Slavi)

sections.description:
Support

Support is handled on our site: http://club.orbisius.com/
Please do NOT use the WordPress forums or other places to seek support.

Orbisius Resume Organizer allows you to organize resumes from job applicants.

Features

  • Create unlimited resume entries
  • Attachments: attach unlimited files and define their type e.g. Resume, Cover Letter, References etc.
  • Files are grouped into deep folder structure e.g. /orbisius-resume-organizer/files/1/2/3/4/ so they can be loaded quickly.
  • Quick and easy interface for deleting attachments (ajax).
  • Easy to use interface
  • TODO: Search

Usage

Go to Admin > Orbisius Resume Organizer.

Then Add a new resume click on Save Draft or Publish. Then extra fields will show up and you can attach files.

Demo

TODO

Support

  • Support is handled on our site: http://club.orbisius.com/support/
  • Please do NOT use the WordPress forums or other places to seek support.

Author

Do you need an amazing plugin created especially for your needs? Contact me. Svetoslav Marinov (Slavi) | Custom Web and Mobile Programming by Orbisius.com
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the package, and upload orbisius-resume-organizer to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
How to use this plugin?

Just install the plugin and activate it. Then go to Admin > Orbisius Resume Organizer.

What to do next?

Go to http://club.orbisius.com and post suggestions in our forum for new features that you’d like to see in this plugin or its extensions.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Numerious fixes.
  • Added file download
  • Files are saved in a different folder now.
  • Added some htaccess rules not allow file listings
  • Removed Google document preview (exposes a risk)
  • The meta boxes (attachments) show in new resumes as well.

1.0.1

  • Added attachment management
  • Misc fixes

1.0.0

  • Initial release
